service.title: Multilingual Support
service.desc: Our platform seamlessly processes and delivers search results in multiple languages, enabling businesses to cater to diverse global audiences with ease.

service.title: Multimodal Search
service.desc: Search across text, images, and audio files all in one platform, using advanced AI to unlock valuable insights from diverse data formats.

service.title: Conversational Intelligence
service.desc: Our GenAI-powered solution understands the context behind user queries, providing accurate and highly relevant results tailored to specific needs.

service.title: Real-Time Information Retrieval
service.desc: Enjoy fast, real-time search results that improve user experience and operational efficiency, regardless of the volume or complexity of your data.

service.title: Secure and Scalable
service.desc: Whether on-premise or cloud-based, our platform ensures enterprise-grade data security while scaling effortlessly to meet your business growth and data demands.

service.title: Cost-Effective SaaS Solution
service.desc: Designed to be affordable for small and medium enterprises (SMEs), our subscription-based model offers cutting-edge AI capabilities without the high upfront costs.

timeline.title: 1. Data Ingestion
timeline.desc: Upload and securely store multimodal data from various sources.

timeline.title: 2. AI Processing
timeline.desc: Our AI analyzes the data, identifying key patterns, context, and language specifics.

timeline.title: 3. Natural Language Search
timeline.desc: Users enter queries in any language; the AI understands and interprets the intent.

timeline.title: 4. Start Integration
timeline.desc: Launch your in house conversational search with existing ecosystem.

pricing.title: Starter Plan
pricing.subTitle: Perfect for small businesses looking to leverage GenAI search at an affordable rate. (Monthly)

pricing.title: Growth Plan
pricing.subTitle: Ideal for growing businesses seeking to expand their data capabilities.

subItem.text: Multilingual search across text, images, and audio

pricing.title: Enterprise Plan
pricing.subTitle: Comprehensive solution for larger businesses with high data demands.

subItem.text: Unlimited search queries across all data types
Custom integrations and dedicated account manager

accordion.title: What makes your platform different from other search solutions?
accordion.desc: Our platform stands out with its multilingual and multimodal search capabilities powered by Generative AI. It enables seamless searches across text, images, and audio, delivering highly accurate, contextual results in real-time, in any language. Unlike other solutions, we cater to diverse data formats and offer both on-premise and SaaS options.

accordion.title: How secure is my data on your platform?
accordion.desc: Data security is a top priority. We offer enterprise-grade security measures, including encryption, secure access protocols, and compliance with major data protection regulations like GDPR. For organizations that require full control, we provide an on-premise solution to keep data within your infrastructure.

accordion.title: Can I integrate your solution with my existing systems?
accordion.desc: Absolutely! Our platform is designed to be highly flexible and integrates easily with existing systems like ERP, CRM, and other databases. We also offer custom integrations in our Enterprise Plan to suit your specific needs.

accordion.title: Do you support non-English languages?
accordion.desc: Yes! Our platform supports searches in multiple languages, including Hindi, Spanish, French, and more, ensuring you can cater to global users or diverse local markets. The platform can understand and process queries in native languages and return relevant results in real-time.

accordion.title: How does the subscription-based SaaS model work?
accordion.desc: Our SaaS model provides you with a flexible, cost-effective solution where you pay based on your usage needs. This eliminates the need for large upfront costs while giving you access to all the latest features and updates. You can choose from our three pricing tiers—Starter, Growth, and Enterprise—depending on the scale of your operations.

accordion.title: What kind of support do you offer?
accordion.desc: We provide multiple levels of support depending on the plan you choose. Our Starter Plan includes email support, while the Growth Plan adds chat support with priority response. For Enterprise customers, we offer 24/7 priority support along with a dedicated account manager.

accordion.title: How easy is it to set up the platform?
accordion.desc: Our platform is designed for quick deployment. For the SaaS version, it can be up and running within minutes. For on-premise installations, our team assists with deployment and customization, ensuring smooth integration into your existing infrastructure.

accordion.title: Can your platform handle large volumes of data?
accordion.desc: Yes! Our platform is built to scale with your business. Whether you're handling millions of queries per month or managing terabytes of multimodal data, our solution provides high performance and reliability to meet your data demands.
